messages.subject: Re: Crockpot Granola recipe
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks katherine!  I like Robin Robertson, her vegetarian meat and potatoes cookbook has some yummy recipes, I was just looking at her crockpot cookbook in B&N
messages.messageBody:
Thanks katherine! I like Robin Robertson, her vegetarian meat and
potatoes cookbook has some yummy recipes,
I was just looking at her crockpot cookbook in B&N not too long ago!
Diane

messages.subject: Crockpot Granola recipe
messages.msgSnippet: I m not sure if this is legal, but she ought to consider it good advertisement since I m including the source:   Fresh from the Vegetarian Slow Cooker by Robin
messages.messageBody:
I'm not sure if this is legal, but she ought to consider it good advertisement since I'm including the source: Fresh from the Vegetarian Slow Cooker by Robin Robertson.

5c oats
1c sliced almonds
3/4c craisins
1/2c raisins
1/2c sesame seeds
2/3c maple syrup
1/4c canola
1/4t cinnamon

Mix all ingredients in crockpot. Do *not* cover with lid. Cook for 1.5 hours on high, then turn to low and cook an additional 2 hours. Stir occasionally. Spread on cookie sheets to cool and dry to crispy. Yields about 8c.

Obviously you can experiment with the ingredients. I really like the craisins though. I haven't tried reducing the syrup or canola because I'm not sure how much the liquid is necessary for the cooking process.

Enjoy,
Katharine
